text: John Joseph Joe Nevin (born 7 June, 1989 , London 2012 Olympics profile: John Joe Nevin in Mullingar, County Westmeath) is an Irish boxer. He competed in the 2008 Summer Olympics and the 2012 Summer Olympics and got a silver medal in the 2012 Summer Olympics. He is currently 3rd AIBA World Rankings - Men's 56 kg in the world in his division, the bantamweight. On 6th October, 2012, John Joe Nevin announces to the public on The Saturday Night Show that he is turning professional == References == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Irish boxers Category:Olympic medalists for Ireland Category:Olympic silver medalists
title: John Joe Nevin
